backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or state, serving as a minimal backend placeholder.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting six implemented features for the Kanhaiya Sweet House website, including header, navigation, about section, menu display, order form, and contact section with high confidence test mappings.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON summary of frontend files describing the main App component structure, global styles with OKLCH color system, Tailwind config, and empty hooks file.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes, using neutral grayscale values for a minimal design system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with viewport meta tag, page title 'Kanhaiya Sweet House', and root div mounting the React application.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component implementing a single-page website for Kanhaiya Sweet House with header, navigation, about section, menu cards for three sweets, order form with state management, contact section with embedded Google Maps, and footer.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an ICP backend actor with authentication support, handling both anonymous and authenticated identities with automatic query invalidation on identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: React context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing login state, identity persistence, and AuthClient lifecycle with configurable options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Intentionally empty file as the static website requires no backend data fetching.
frontend/src/index.css: Global styles with Tailwind layers defining OKLCH color variables for warm orange/cream theme (#fff3e0 background), smooth scrolling behavior, and typography using Arial font.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React application entry point that sets up QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and renders the App component into the root DOM element.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration file defining custom color tokens using OKLCH color space, extended theme settings for borders/shadows/animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state file documenting a single-page website for Kanhaiya Sweet House with features including header, navigation, about section, menu with pricing, order form, contact section with map, and footer using orange/amber color scheme.
